sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: The Beachbody Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:BODI) Given Average Rating of "Hold" by Brokerages
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:BODI) has received an average "Hold" rating from five brokerages, with a consensus 12-month price target of $8.00. Despite beating Q3 earnings and revenue estimates, the company faces weak fundamentals including negative net margins and return on equity. Institutional investors hold 74.48% of the stock, which currently trades around $10.05.

feed.title: The Beachbody Company, Inc. (NASDAQ: BODI) execs lead NobleCon21 fireside chat
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company, Inc. (BODI) announced that its executives, Mark Goldston, Carl Daikeler, and Brad Ramberg, will participate in a Fireside Chat at NobleCon21 on December 3, 2025, at 3:30 PM ET in Boca Raton, FL. A high-definition webcast of the presentation will be available the following day on the company's website and other platforms, and will be archived for 90 days. The news of their presentation led to a 16.28% gain in BODI's stock, adding an estimated $11M to its valuation, bringing the market cap to $78M.

feed.title: Canaccord Genuity raises Beachbody stock price target to $9 on profitability gains
feed.summary: Canaccord Genuity has increased its price target for The Beachbody Company (NASDAQ:BODI) to $9.00 from $7.00, maintaining a Buy rating despite a 41.4% year-over-year sales decline in Q3. The adjustment follows Beachbody's Q3 earnings report, which exceeded analyst expectations and company guidance, achieving its eighth consecutive quarter of positive adjusted EBITDA and its first positive net income since going public. The company is also moving its Class A common stock listing to the Nasdaq Capital Market to leverage its advanced trading technology.

feed.title: The Beachbody Company, Inc.'s (NASDAQ:BODI) Price Is Right But Growth Is Lacking After Shares Rocket 46%
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company's stock has seen a 46% surge recently, but its price-to-sales (P/S) ratio of 0.2x is significantly lower than the industry average due to declining revenues. Analysts predict a continued revenue slump of 16% in the coming year, while the industry is expected to grow by 10%. This weak outlook on revenue growth suggests that investors are not expecting pleasant surprises, and a significant rise in stock price is unlikely without material change.

feed.title: Canaccord Genuity raises Beachbody stock price target to $9 on profitability gains By Investing.com
feed.summary: Canaccord Genuity has raised its price target for Beachbody Company (NASDAQ:BODI) to $9 from $7, maintaining a Buy rating after the company's Q3 earnings report. Beachbody reported sales of $59.9 million, exceeding expectations, and achieved positive adjusted EBITDA for the eighth consecutive quarter, along with positive net income for the first time since going public. The company also announced a strategic transfer of its Class A common stock listing to the Nasdaq Capital Market, aiming to leverage Nasdaq’s technology and market data services.

feed.title: Canaccord Genuity raises Beachbody stock price target to $9 on profitability gains
feed.summary: Canaccord Genuity increased its price target for The Beachbody Company (NASDAQ: BODI) to $9.00 from $7.00, reiterating a Buy rating following stronger-than-expected Q3 earnings. Despite a significant year-over-year revenue decline, Beachbody exceeded analyst expectations and company guidance, achieving its eighth consecutive quarter of positive adjusted EBITDA and its first net income since going public. The company's strategic move to the Nasdaq Capital Market and efforts to lower its revenue breakeven point are also highlighted.

feed.title: BODi (NASDAQ: BODI) posts $3.6M net income, 74.6% gross margin
feed.summary: BODi announced its first net income since its 2021 IPO, reporting $3.6 million in net income and a 74.6% gross margin for the third quarter of 2025. The company's revenue for the quarter was $59.9 million, and it achieved its eighth consecutive quarter of positive Adjusted EBITDA, alongside clear visibility to positive free cash flow for the full year. This performance reflects a successful strategic transformation focused on strengthening financial position and building a more efficient operating model.

feed.title: At-Home Fitness Pioneer BODi Launches New Program and Community Platform
feed.summary: BODi, the pioneer in digital at-home fitness, announced the launch of a new program called "25 Minute Speed Train" and "The BODi Experience Community." The "25 Minute Speed Train" program is designed by Super Trainer Joel Freeman to provide effective, short-duration workouts, while the community platform aims to enhance customer engagement through support groups, challenges, and direct interaction with trainers. Additionally, BODi relaunched its Affiliate Partner Program and introduced a referral program to expand its reach and empower customers and influencers.

feed.title: Beachbody Company Transfers Stock Listing to Nasdaq
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company announced its decision to transfer its Class A common stock listing from the New York Stock Exchange to the Nasdaq Capital Market, effective September 3, 2025. This move aims to leverage Nasdaq's advanced trading technology and market data services, positioning Beachbody with a marketplace that supports innovative companies. Beachbody's stock currently holds a "Hold" rating with a $5.50 price target, and TipRanks' AI Analyst Spark rates BODI as "Neutral" due to weak financial performance.

feed.title: Beachbody Moves Stock Listing From NYSE to Nasdaq
feed.summary: Beachbody (BODi) is voluntarily transferring its stock listing from the New York Stock Exchange to Nasdaq, with trading set to begin on September 3rd. This move allows the company to leverage Nasdaq's advanced trading technology as it executes a strategic transformation, pivoting away from its multi-level marketing model and focusing on nutrition, legacy brands, and digital community building. The switch follows a NYSE warning regarding compliance with listing standards earlier this year.

feed.title: Beachbody’s Stock Transferred to Nasdaq
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company, Inc. (BODi) announced its voluntary transfer of Class A common stock listing from the New York Stock Exchange to the Nasdaq Capital Market, effective September 3, 2025. The company will continue trading under the symbol "BODI" and anticipates leveraging Nasdaq's technology and market data services. Executives Carl Daikeler and Mark Goldston expressed enthusiasm for aligning with Nasdaq's innovative company community.

feed.title: BODi to transfer stock listing from NYSE to Nasdaq Capital Market
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company, Inc. (BODi) announced its decision to voluntarily transfer its Class A common stock listing from the New York Stock Exchange to the Nasdaq Capital Market, effective September 3, 2025, while retaining its "BODI" trading symbol. This move is part of the company's strategic transformation and aims to leverage Nasdaq's advanced trading technology and market data services. The announcement follows a recent $35 million financing package secured by Beachbody to strengthen its financial position and retire outstanding debt.

feed.title: The Beachbody Company announces transfer of stock exchange listing to Nasdaq
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company has announced its decision to transfer its stock exchange listing to Nasdaq. This move signifies a change in where the company's shares will be traded and could be part of a broader strategy. Further details about the effective date or reasons for the transfer were not provided in the snippet.

feed.title: The Beachbody Company Drops New Workout Program & Digital Community in Bid for Comeback
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company (BODi) is launching a new workout program, "25 Minute Speed Train," and a digital community called "The BODi Experience Community," as part of its strategic shift away from a multi-level marketing (MLM) model. These initiatives aim to deepen community ties, enhance engagement, and leverage word-of-mouth marketing through a relaunched affiliate program and expanded referral system. The company is also planning to introduce new product lines and partnerships in the coming years to support its comeback bid.

It utilizes technical analysis rules to identify support and resistance levels for swing trades, day trades, and long-term investing plans. feed.title: The Beachbody Company, Inc. (BODI) Live Share Price, Invest From India
feed.summary: This article provides a comprehensive overview of The Beachbody Company, Inc. (BODI) stock, including its live share price, performance metrics, fundamental indicators, valuation trends, and analyst recommendations. It details the company's financial results, institutional holdings, and offers guidance for Indian investors on how to invest in BODI shares.

feed.title: The Beachbody Company Inc. Class A (BODI) reports earnings
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company Inc. Class A (BODI) reported a 21% decrease in total revenue to $418.8 million for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2024, attributed to lower demand across its digital, nutrition, and connected fitness segments. Despite this, the company improved its net loss to $71.6 million from $152.6 million and achieved an Adjusted EBITDA of $28.3 million. The report highlights the financial impact of its "Pivot" restructuring and ongoing efforts to refinance its term loan.

feed.title: BODi and Telehealth Provider Dr. B Partner to Enable Pre-Tax Reimbursement for BODi Fitness Solutions in all 50 States
The Beachbody Company Launches New Initiative Enabling Customers to Buy and Download Fitness Programs Like P90X and 21 DAY FIX Without a Subscription
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company (BODi) announced a new initiative allowing customers to purchase popular fitness and nutrition programs like P90X and 21 DAY FIX individually, without a subscription. This move aims to meet latent demand and broaden access, complementing their existing subscription model. CEO Carl Daikeler believes this strategy will introduce more people to BODi's offerings and potentially lead to subscription upgrades, leveraging their extensive library of over 134 digital programs.

feed.title: Analysts Offer Insights on Communication Services Companies: Beachbody Company (BODI) and Verizon (VZ)
feed.summary: Two analysts have issued bullish sentiments on Communication Services companies, with Noble Financial's Michael Kupinski giving Beachbody Company (BODI) a Buy rating and a $12.00 price target. Evercore ISI's Kutgun Maral maintained a Buy rating on Verizon (VZ) with a $48.00 price target. Both companies hold a Moderate Buy consensus rating from analysts.

feed.title: Beachbody's Shift Towards Profitable Growth May Raise Their Net Worth Far Beyond Their Current Market Cap Of $37 Million
feed.summary: Beachbody is undergoing a significant business model shift from a multi-level marketing (MLM) framework to a streamlined single-level affiliate program, aiming for profitable growth. This change is expected to generate $54 million in annual savings and could significantly increase its current net worth of $37.35 million. The article details Beachbody's history, including its founding, its pivot to MLM with P90X, controversies surrounding its MLM practices, and its successful shift to streaming services, culminating in its current strategic pivot.

feed.title: The Beachbody Company Evolves Core Business Model with Updated Omnichannel Approach Focused on Accelerating Path to Profitable Growth
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company (BODi) is revamping its core business model to an omnichannel approach, moving from Multi-Level Marketing (MLM) to a single-level Affiliate Program and expanding direct-to-consumer and Amazon channels. This restructuring is expected to significantly reduce costs, lower the revenue break-even point by approximately 47% to under $225 million, and includes a 33% workforce reduction for $54 million in annualized savings. BODi reaffirms its Q3 2024 financial guidance while anticipating this shift will accelerate its path to profitable growth.

feed.title: BODi by Beachbody Becomes an Official Wellness Supporter of the American Diabetes Association
feed.summary: BODi by Beachbody announced its partnership with the American Diabetes Association (ADA) as an Official Wellness Supporter to provide healthy lifestyle solutions for 136 million Americans affected by diabetes or prediabetes. The collaboration will involve BODi offering fitness and nutrition resources, including a dedicated microsite and digital programs, while the ADA provides content on diabetes awareness, management, and prevention. A portion of the proceeds from BODi digital program sales will be donated to the ADA, with a minimum commitment of $100,000.

feed.title: BODi by Beachbody Launches BODi LAVA, the Perfect Summer Fitness Program with Super Trainer Elise Joan
feed.summary: BODi by Beachbody has launched BODi LAVA, a new 20-minute workout program designed by Super Trainer Elise Joan. This program combines power yoga, primal movement, and bodyweight strength training, requiring no equipment and promising significant weight loss and fitness improvements. Digital access to the 30 workouts is available for purchase now, with the program joining BODi’s subscription library in December 2024.

feed.title: Beachbody (BODi) Drives Growth Through Expansion of Premier Digital Fitness Content Available for Individual Purchase
feed.summary: BODi announced it has doubled the number of its fitness and nutrition programs available for individual digital purchase without a subscription, aiming to drive long-term growth and attract new customers. This expansion includes popular programs like INSANITY and Yoga52, complementing BODi's subscription model and providing more flexible access to its content library. The company views digital purchases as a gateway to full subscriptions and is also aggressively expanding its nutrition business.

feed.title: Beachbody (BODi) Launches “Invest in Your BODi” Retail Shareholder Rewards Program
The Beachbody Company Ticker Symbol Changes Next Week
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company, Inc. will change its Class A common stock ticker symbol to BODi on the New York Stock Exchange, effective March 4, 2024. This change reflects the company's rebrand from Beachbody to BODi, announced in March 2023. The stock will continue to be listed on the NYSE, and its CUSIP will remain unchanged.

feed.title: Beachbody Co (NASDAQ: BODY) stock to jump 5,000% - sadly, it’s only nominal
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company (NASDAQ: BODY) stock is set to experience a 5,000% increase, but this is merely a nominal change due to a one-for-fifty reverse stock split, not a reflection of improved business fundamentals. This technical move addresses Nasdaq's minimum bid price rule, allowing the company to remain on the main markets despite its underlying financial challenges like negative margins and falling sales. The reverse split does not alter the company's market capitalization but mechanically adjusts the stock price to meet listing requirements.

feed.title: The Beachbody Company, Inc. Completes Reverse Stock Split
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company, Inc. (BODi) announced the completion of a one-for-fifty reverse stock split of its common stock, effective November 21, 2023. This action is intended to help the company regain compliance with NYSE minimum closing price requirements and drive long-term shareholder value, supported by ongoing cost savings and new revenue initiatives. The split reduced outstanding Class A common stock from 177.81 million to 3.56 million and Class X common stock from 136.45 million to 2.73 million.

feed.title: Beachbody Works on Turnaround
feed.summary: The Beachbody Co. Inc., a subscription health and wellness service, is implementing a turnaround strategy after facing potential delisting from the New York Stock Exchange due to an "abnormally low" stock price. Initiatives include a rebrand to BODi, new pricing, modified payment structures for fitness partners, and a new chief growth and performance advisor. The company is actively working to restore growth, generate positive cash flow, and address legal challenges from a class-action lawsuit filed by its fitness coaches concerning unpaid wages.

feed.title: The Beachbody Company, Inc. Announces Third Quarter 2023 Financial Results
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company, Inc. (BODi) reported third-quarter 2023 financial results, delivering revenue and cash used in operations ahead of guidance midpoint. The company reduced cash used in operations significantly and is undergoing a turnaround plan focused on sales, marketing, and increased profitability. BODi provided its outlook for the fourth quarter of 2023, expecting revenue between $105 million and $115 million.

feed.title: BODi Unveils New Sales Strategy To Grow Brand
feed.summary: BODi, formerly Beachbody, is launching a new "Growth Game Plan" in January 2024 to reward top-performing sales partners as part of its turnaround strategy. This initiative follows a class-action lawsuit and coincides with the appointment of Brendon Burchard as Chief Growth and Performance Advisor and an overhaul of its content development strategy. The company is actively working to improve its financial standing after receiving a NYSE deficiency letter and experiencing a 7% revenue decrease in Q2 2023.

feed.title: Multibillion-dollar Santa Monica fitness company faces allegations of exploiting exercise coaches
feed.summary: Beachbody, now BODi, a Santa Monica-based fitness company, is facing a class-action lawsuit alleging exploitation of its exercise coaches. The lawsuit claims that coaches, including lead plaintiff Jessica Lyons, were used as low-cost labor, often working long hours for minimal pay, despite the company's multi-billion dollar valuation. This case is significant as it's the first to utilize new California legislation to challenge a multilevel marketing company's classification of workers as independent contractors.

feed.title: Beachbody Changes Name to BODi on its Mission to Build the Health Esteem Category
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company, Inc. is rebranding to BODi, launching a new digital platform, and initiating a marketing campaign focused on a new "Health Esteem" category. This shift departs from the traditional fitness industry's self-criticism model to one that promotes positive mindset and self-acceptance before pursuing health goals. The new platform introduces programs like “For Beginners Only” and emphasizes recovery and a resilient mindset, supported by new leadership in personal development.

feed.title: Acclaimed Dietitian Nutritionist, Best-Selling Author, and Mom of Three, Ilana Muhlstein, Teams Up with The Beachbody Company to Help Pregnant Women Navigate Their Nutrition
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company has launched "2B Pregnant," a new nutritional program for expectant mothers created by registered dietitian Ilana Muhlstein. The program aims to help pregnant women navigate nutrition, manage common challenges like nausea and cravings, and establish healthy habits based on Muhlstein's best-selling "2B Mindset" principles. "2B Pregnant" is available on Beachbody on Demand for a one-time purchase.

feed.title: Super Trainer Megan Davies Redefines Training Mentality; Highlights Importance of Feeling Good with Launch of “Sure Thing”
feed.summary: Super Trainer Megan Davies has launched "Sure Thing," a new fitness program with The Beachbody Company that emphasizes feeling good daily and achieving a healthy lifestyle through "TYPE TRAINING™." The program, available for VIP Early Access on December 20, combines specific workout routines with flexible eating plans like 2B Mindset and Portion Fix, and nutrition offerings such as Shakeology and Energize. It focuses on celebrating daily wins and fostering a positive mindset towards fitness rather than solely concentrating on end results.

feed.title: Beachbody’s Newest Super Trainer, Andrea Rogers, Debuts All New Cardio-Dance Program, “XB Sweat + Sculpt”
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company has launched "XB Sweat + Sculpt," a new cardio-dance program by Super Trainer Andrea Rogers. This 3-week program, available on Beachbody On Demand, balances low-impact cardio with strength-focused workouts, designed to be fun, effective, and accessible for all fitness levels. It aims to build a strong, toned body and boost confidence through movement, with optional equipment and bonus "Express" workouts for busy days.

feed.title: New Shakeology® Clinical Study Validates Weight Loss Benefits
feed.summary: A new clinical study published in the Journal of Nutrition validated that Shakeology, a superfood nutrition shake from The Beachbody Company, delivers weight loss benefits. The 12-week randomized, double-blinded, and placebo-controlled trial found that participants using Shakeology twice daily experienced significantly greater weight loss, decreased cholesterol, and increased levels of the metabolic hormone adiponectin. This study reinforces the scientific basis for Shakeology's efficacy beyond just caloric properties, attributing benefits to its additional ingredients like protein, fiber, and superfood blends.

feed.title: Beachbody Breaks New Ground in “GUT HEALTH” Mega-Trend With New Program from Autumn Calabrese, Super Trainer, Nutrition Expert and Best-Selling Author
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company has launched "The 4 Week Gut Protocol" nutrition plan and "4 Weeks for Every Body" no-impact fitness program, developed by Super Trainer Autumn Calabrese. These programs address gut health issues, which affect millions, by combining targeted nutrition, supplements, and moderate exercise. Users are reporting significant health improvements and weight loss within weeks, making it one of Beachbody's most impactful innovations.

feed.title: 12 best fitness apps for staying fighting fit
feed.summary: This article reviews and ranks the 12 best fitness apps for 2025 based on extensive testing by the Good Housekeeping Institute. It covers various apps suitable for different fitness levels and goals, detailing their features, pricing, and specific benefits, from all-round fitness to specialized yoga or gym-focused plans.

feed.title: Make Your Health A Priority This New Year with “Job 1,” The New Fitness Program from Beachbody On Demand Super Trainer and Celebrated Fitness Expert Jennifer Jacobs
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company has launched "Job 1," a new at-home fitness program designed by Super Trainer Jennifer Jacobs, focusing on prioritizing health with efficient 20-minute daily workouts. The program, available on Beachbody On Demand, aims to help members achieve fitness goals and build consistent habits, offering a mix of strength, cardio, and optional indoor cycling workouts. It caters to all fitness levels with modifications and bonus content to enhance results.

feed.title: Group Fitness Goes Digital: The Beachbody Company Launches “BODi”, A Live Connected Fitness Experience Unlike Anything on the Market
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company has launched "BODi" (Beachbody On Demand Interactive), a new premium subscription tier offering live, interactive group fitness classes. BODi features patent-pending "BODcast" technology, allowing up to 100 members to appear on-screen during workouts and receive real-time feedback, alongside a diverse range of classes and original artist music. This service aims to provide an immersive, high-energy studio fitness experience from home, including indoor cycling on the MYX fitness bike.

feed.title: The Beachbody Company’s MYXfitness Introduces New MYX II Bike; The First Connected Fitness Bike with Two Fitness Platforms Available
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company's MYXfitness has launched the new MYX II bike, featuring hardware upgrades and integrated access to two unique digital fitness platforms: Beachbody on Demand (BOD) and Openfit. This connected fitness bike offers a personalized experience with live and on-demand classes, heart rate-based workouts, and options ranging from boutique-style training to interactive group fitness. The MYX II and MYX II Plus models are competitively priced and include enhanced technical features for a comprehensive home fitness system.

feed.title: Beachbody Super Trainer & Celebrity Fitness Trainer Amoila Cesar Debuts New Training Program, “645,” Inspired by His Proven Methods With Top Pro Athletes
feed.summary: Beachbody Super Trainer Amoila Cesar has released a new digital fitness program called "645," inspired by his training methods with celebrity and professional athletes. This 13-week program focuses on full-body resistance, agility cardio, and restorative mobility to achieve peak performance while preventing injuries. Beachbody On Demand is offering incentives, including a $45 reward, for participants who complete the program with their Total Solution package.

feed.title: Beachbody And Myx Fitness Complete Merger With Forest Road Acquisition Corp.
feed.summary: The Beachbody Company Group, LLC completed a three-way merger with Myx Fitness Holdings, LLC and Forest Road Acquisition Corp. on June 25, 2021, forming The Beachbody Company, Inc. Shares of the combined company began trading on the NYSE under ticker symbols "BODY" and "BODY WS" on June 28, 2021. The merger aims to accelerate growth, expand capital, integrate connected fitness hardware through Myx, and foster innovative in-home fitness content.
